title: Deploying a Go CLI to npm
summary: I’m building a CLI tool similar to `npx create-xyz@latest`. Rather than using TypeScript, which lacks robust templating support, I prefer Go for its powerful `text/template` and `html/template` packages. This approach allows me to create a flexible and effective CLI tool, comparable to Python's [Copier framework](https://copier.readthedocs.io/en/stable/).

title: NixOS Black Screen on First Load with Nvidia
summary: When loading the NixOS Minimal ISO image for the first time on a system with an Nvidia graphics card, you may encounter a black screen. This can be resolved with specific graphics configurations, which can also be adapted for gaming setups.

title: Configuring Git Credentials on NixOS
summary: If you're using NixOS without a graphical environment like GNOME, you may need to configure a keyring to store Git credentials. Pairing this with the NixOS GitHub package configuration can prevent repeated prompts for your GitHub credentials.

title: Setting Up Sound on NixOS with an Audio Interface
summary: To enable sound on NixOS, you’ll need to configure your setup accordingly. This guide provides a basic setup that can be expanded to support advanced configurations, including audio interfaces.
